text:
Apache binaries http://www.apachelounge.com/download/VC14/binaries/httpd-2.4.17-win64-VC14.zip , php using mod_php http://windows.php.net/downloads/releases/php-5.6.14-Win32-VC11-x64.zip

Apache completely ignore AddDefaultCharset windows-1251 directive in vhosts, httpd.conf, .htaccess , serving all as utf-8.

<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerAdmin webmaster@dummy-host.example.com
    DocumentRoot "d:/wwwroot/bbb/www/"
    ServerName www.bbb.lu
    ServerAlias bbb.lu
    ErrorLog "logs/bbb-error.log"
    CustomLog "logs/bbb-access.log" common	

    <Directory  "d:/wwwroot/bbb/www/">
        AllowOverride All
	Allow from all
	AddDefaultCharset WINDOWS-1251
  </Directory>
</VirtualHost>

Not a bug.
Also need to change default_charset = "windows-1251" in php.ini
